channel.title: Bioconductor community blog
channel.description: A blog for the Bioconductor community!

item.title: Bringing Bioconductor to Galaxy: A CoFest Collaboration
item.description: Written during CoFest at GBCC2025, this post shares training materials, introduces Galaxy tool wrapping, and previews what’s next for integrating Bioconductor tools in Galaxy.

item.title: Bioconductor Training partners with Physalia Courses
item.dc:creator: Maria Doyle, Charlotte Soneson, and Laurent Gatto
item.description: A new collaboration to expand access to bioinformatics training through co-branded courses, instructor support, and inclusive access.

item.title: Bioconductor is Moving from Slack to Zulip for Community Chat
item.dc:creator: Maria Doyle
item.description: Bioconductor’s community chat is moving from Slack to Zulip on Monday 2 June 2025. The transition ensures long-term access to discussions and better reflects our open-source values.

item.title: Ask and you shall receive
item.dc:creator: Vince Carey
item.description: Discussion of evolving complexity and value of the Bioconductor ecosystem.

item.title: Bioconductor in Africa: Highlights from Our First In-Person Course
item.dc:creator: Maria Doyle
item.description: In March 2025, Bioconductor marked an exciting milestone—our first in-person course on the African continent. Hosted by the International Institute of Tropical Agriculture (IITA) in Nairobi, this five-day workshop brought together 32 researchers for hands-on training in genomic data analysis using R and Bioconductor.

item.title: Outreachy December 2024 Interns with Bioconductor
item.dc:creator: Kate Rasheed
Divine Aleru
item.description: Bioconductor participated in the Outreachy Internship program for the December 2024 to March 2025 cohort. Our interns share their experience working on their various projects and Bioconductor in general.

item.title: Bioconductor Community Advisory Board
item.dc:creator: Stevie Pederson
item.description: An introduction to the new Co-Chair

item.title: Bioconductor Carpentry: Celebrating Two Years of Global Training
item.dc:creator: Maria Doyle
item.description: As we complete two years of Instructor training, we reflect on our journey since becoming a member of The Carpentries in August 2022 (announcement). Our goal was to train 30 Instructors globally - 15 in year 1 and 15 in year 2. We began onboarding the first cohort in January 2023 (year 1 update), and our final Instructor from the second cohort was certified in January 2025.

item.title: Open Science Mentoring: My Journey with Outreachy Mentees
item.dc:creator: Svetlana Ugarcina Perovic
item.description: Bioconductor has been participating in the Outreachy Internship program since 2022. In this post, I, Svetlana Ugarcina Perovic, a senior researcher in microbiome science, share my journey of Outreachy mentoring, detailing my experience with the Microbiome Study Curation project and open science projects.

item.title: 2024 SpatialData Workshop
item.dc:creator: Artür Manukyan
item.description: R/Bioconductor developers participating in the 1st scverse SpatialData Workshop

item.title: EuroBioC2024 conference recap
item.dc:creator: Maria Doyle
item.description: Highlights from the 2024 Bioconductor European Conference in Oxford.

item.title: Announcing the First Galaxy and Bioconductor Community Conference (GBCC 2025)
item.dc:creator: Maria Doyle (Bioconductor)
Natalie Whitaker-Allen (Galaxy)
item.description: Join us at CSHL, New York, June 23-26!

item.title: Outreachy May 2024
item.dc:creator: Scholastica Urua
item.description: Bioconductor participated in the Outreachy Internship program for the May 2024 cohort. In this post, our intern shares her journey, detailing her experience working on the Microbiome Study Curation project and Bioconductor in general.

item.title: BioC2024 conference recap
item.dc:creator: Maria Doyle
item.description: Highlights from the 2024 Bioconductor North American Conference in Grand Rapids.

item.title: Beatriz Calvo-Serra: inaugural Bioconductor Athena Award winner
item.dc:creator: Robert Castelo
Maria Doyle
Aedin Culhane
item.description: Celebrating Bea’s contributions, resilience, and the inaugural Bioconductor Athena Award in her honor.

item.title: Bioconductor highlights from the CZI Open Science Meeting
item.dc:creator: Maria Doyle
item.description: Bioconductor grantees gathered in Boston for the CZI Open Science Meeting.

item.description: Welcome to the Bioconductor Community Slack Workspace! 🎉

item.title: Launching the New Bioconductor.org
item.dc:creator: Maria Doyle
item.description: A look into the final updates, community-driven improvements, and what’s next for our website.
